ivardefs.name: bodySite
ivardefs.desc: Anatomical location from which the specimen was collected (if subject is a patient). This is the target site.  This element is not used for environmental specimens.

ivardefs.name: duration
ivardefs.desc: The span of time over which the collection of a specimen occurred.

ivardefs.name: method
ivardefs.desc: A coded value specifying the technique that is used to perform the procedure.

ivardefs.name: quantity
ivardefs.desc: The quantity of specimen collected; for instance the volume of a blood sample, or the physical measurement of an anatomic pathology sample.
